00015 DC_DummyConditionalPunctualAction::DC_DummyConditionalPunctualAction(void) {
00016         executionFlag=false;
00017         setClassId(ID_DUMMYCONDITIONALPUNCTUALACTION);
00018 }
00019 
00020 void DC_DummyConditionalPunctualAction::setExecutionFlag(bool newState) {
00021         executionFlag=newState;
00022 }
00023 
00024 bool DC_DummyConditionalPunctualAction::canExecute(void) {
00025         return executionFlag;
00026 }
00027 
00028 TD_ActionOutcome DC_DummyConditionalPunctualAction::doConditionalAction(void) {
00029         return ACTION_SUCCESS;
